Tooltip: Initialize a new incognito chrome tab and log into the RBC account provided.

Arguments.Name: in_CredentialName
Arguments.Tooltip: The name of the credential asset to use for logging into RBC.

Arguments.Name: in_CredentialFolder
Arguments.Tooltip: The folder of the credential asset to use for logging into RBC.

Arguments.Name: out_Window
Arguments.Tooltip: The window element to be used in later activities.
